evidence.text:
LAWRENCE: You’re a manager. Manage.
LAWRENCE: Your Eminences, before we eat I should like to introduce a new member of our order, whose existence was not known to any of us until a few hours ago. This is because our brother was made a cardinal by a perfectly legitimate procedure known as creation in pectore. The reason why it had to be done this way is known only to God and to the late Holy Father. But I think we can guess well enough as our new brother’s ministry is an extremely dangerous one.
